playermessages.backupDone: 備份已創建到插件文件夾
playermessages.channelNameContainsInvalidCharacters: 此通道名稱包含無效字符
playermessages.channelRemovedCauseNoSign: 頻道刪除!在世界上沒有其他的告示牌
playermessages.commandForNextPage: 輸入 /wr list pagenumber 到下一頁!
playermessages.customizedLanguageSuccessfullyLoaded: 您已成功加載自定義語言到無線紅石
playermessages.DBAboutToBeDeleted: 您將要刪除整個數據庫 你這樣做之前備份就搞定 如果你一定要做到 你有15秒的時間再次鍵入此命令
playermessages.DBDeleted: 數據庫已經成功地刪除
playermessages.forMoreInfosPerformWRInfo: 要了解頻道更多信息 請執行 /wr info [channel]
playermessages.playerCannotCreateReceiverOnBlock: 您不能在此方塊上創建一個無線接收器!
playermessages.playerCannotCreateSign: 您沒有創建這種告示牌的許可權!
playermessages.playerCannotDestroyReceiverTorch: 您不得破壞我的神奇活把朋友!
playermessages.playerCannotDestroySign: 您不得破壞這個告示牌!
playermessages.playerCreatedChannel: 您剛剛創建了一個新的頻道!
playermessages.playerDoesntHaveAccessToChannel: 您沒有權限訪問該頻道
playermessages.allTransmittersGone: No other Transmitters found, switching receivers off.
playermessages.playerCannotDestroyBlockAttachedToSign: You cannot destroy a block that is attached to a Wireless Redstone sign!
playermessages.convertContinue: Are you really sure you want to change to %%STORAGETYPE? A backup will be created if you continue. You have 15 seconds to confirm with the same command.
playermessages.convertSameType: Converting files failed! You're already on your indicated storage type.
playermessages.convertFailed: Converting files failed! Allowed types: sql or yaml.

logmessages.newUpdateAvailable: 有新版本 請去下載 http://dev.bukkit.org/server-mods/wireless-redstone/
